drivers.name: lips4
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

Driver for Canon's LIPS 4 printer language, raster version. Use the vector version ("lips4v") to get better printout quality. This driver is included in ESP Ghostscript.

drivers.name: lips4v
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

Driver for Canon's LIPS 4 printer language, vector version. There is also a raster version ("lips4"). This driver is included in ESP Ghostscript.

notes: Laser printer using LIPS 4, a vector-based page description language developed by Canon. To let Ghostscript do vector-rendering, use the "lips4v" driver. The driver is included in ESP Ghostscript.
